larry_summers_relationship.identity: Lawrence Summers - Treasury Secretary (1999-2001), Harvard President (2001-2006)
larry_summers_relationship.context: Subject: 'Call from New Yorker' - coordinating response to media inquiry

key_communications.quote: last i looked (sic), you do not have ovaries

you care very much for this person. you might want to demonstrate that

larry_summers_relationship.significance: Summers still in close personal contact with convicted sex offender Epstein in March 2019, 4 months before Epstein's arrest. Discussing personal relationship matters and coordinating about New Yorker media inquiry.

ehud_barak_relationship.identity: Ehud Barak - Israeli Prime Minister (1999-2001), Defense Minister, IDF Chief of Staff

key_communications.barak_quote: The Trump momentum, I believe was stopped. Hillary might be on her way to Win. But with much lower margin, and probably still GOP controlled Senate.

key_communications.context: Barak shares Trump-Israel video with Epstein

ehud_barak_relationship.significance: Former Israeli PM in regular casual communication with Epstein about US election and Trump

police_department_donations.finding: Epstein gave $100,000 to Palm Beach Police Department for 'sophisticated equipment'

police_department_donations.outcome: Money returned when Epstein came under suspicion
